title: Why i quit league
body:
MrJiminyCricket: moment of silence for rape victims
MrJiminyCricket: alistar i pray for you
IAmStarcadium: ?
MrJiminyCricket: your uncle slams your anus every saturday after a few appletinis
IAmStarcadium: my un cle is dead
IAmStarcadium: ...
MrJiminyCricket: good
MrJiminyCricket: probably your ugly face killed him
MrJiminyCricket: riding you from behind and then you turn around to catch the load and he has a heart attack

This should be enough reason
I hate the community. Just a though for those who know that they are toxic.

replies.body:
I completely agree, this is disgraceful! 
It should never happen and happens far to often. 
While muting is a good short term solution, it's not enough!
The community needs to start getting it's act together.
We all deserve to be apart of something we can be proud of.

INTRODUCING THE NEW, EPIC /MUTE BUTTON.

IT STOPS RAGING, YOU CAN FOCUS GAMES, YOU CAN BE HAPPY!

WHAT'S BEST IS, IT'S FREE!

Use it.

And you're name n' shaming.

Read the fuckn' rules.
Report the guy and also send in a support ticket to ban him. I'm sick of behaviour like this also. Ruins the game.
The only problem is that this is post game and where mute doesn't apply

Sorry if you got offended but what he said got a chuckle from me.

I get dad jokes sometimes and mine died a long time ago.  I just realise the arsehat making the comments is a 13 year old kid, shrug it off and move on. Mute button is your best friend.
theres a thing called the mute button..... stop naming and shaming

This jiminycricket guy sounds like an arse.

mute and move on.
